hero.subtitle: CabeÃ§a de Queijo is a fan club for the American National Football (NFL) Team - Green Bay Packers in Brasil. We are a group of fans that love the Packers and want to share our passion with other fans in Brasil.

sellingPoints.title: Why Should You Root For the Green Bay Packers?
sellingPoints.subtext: The Green Bay Packers have a rich history, filled with numerous championships and legendary players. Rooting for the Packers means joining a global community of passionate fans. Plus, who doesn't love cheese?

sellingPoints.title: Rich History
sellingPoints.description: The Green Bay Packers were founded in 1919 and have won 13 championships, more than any other team in the NFL.

sellingPoints.title: Global Community
sellingPoints.description: Rooting for the Packers means joining a global community of passionate fans.

sellingPoints.title: Cheeseheads
sellingPoints.description: Packers fans are affectionately known as 'Cheeseheads', a fun and unique part of NFL fan culture.

sellingPoints.title: Lambeau Field
sellingPoints.description: The Packers' home, Lambeau Field, is one of the most iconic stadiums in all of sports.

sellingPoints.title: Non-Profit Ownership
sellingPoints.description: The Packers are the only non-profit, community-owned franchise in the NFL.

sellingPoints.title: Competitive Team
sellingPoints.description: The Packers are consistently competitive and have a strong team, making their games exciting to watch.

cta.subtext: Join a chapter near you or start your own.
